abstract: University of Texas at Austin unveils new rules for concealed handguns on campus; president Gregory L Fenves acknowledges his own opposition to policy and concerns expressed by staff and faculty, but says he must comply with new state law requiring public colleges and universities to allow concealed carry.
lead_paragraph: The university president, Gregory L. Fenves, in announcing the policy, which follows state law, said he still did not believe handguns belonged on campus.

headline.main: University of Texas Sets Parameters for Concealed Handguns on Austin Campus
headline.print_headline: University of Texas Sets Rules for Concealed Handguns on Austin Campus

snippet: The university president, Gregory L. Fenves, in announcing the policy, which follows state law, said he still did not believe handguns belonged on campus.
